entry.title: Prof. Tang receives Early Career Award from HK RGC

link.title: Prof. Tang receives Early Career Award from HK RGC

entry.content: Thrilled and humbled to be a recipient of the Hong Kong Research Grants Council‚Äôs Early Career Award!

entry.title: MSc students, Leizhen and Yulin, completed their thesis defense and graduated!

link.title: MSc students, Leizhen and Yulin, completed their thesis defense and graduated!

entry.content: Huge congratulations to MSc students, Leizhen Zhou and Yulin Xie, who have recently defended their theses. The research environment in AOEL can serve as an effective springboard for students to move on to amazing jobs! Yulin will be joining the R&D department at a leading LED company in Shenzhen.
entry.summary: Huge congratulations to MSc students, Leizhen Zhou and Yulin Xie, who have recently defended their theses. The research environment in AOEL can serve as an effective springboard for students to move on to amazing jobs! Yulin will be joining the R&D department at a leading LED company in Shenzhen.
